text: Andrew George Duff (22 May 1890 – 27 March 1981) was an Australian rules footballer who played for the Collingwood Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Andy Duff's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1890 births Category:1981 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Andy Duff
